name: The Last Supper (spooky cafe)
description:
"I am a chef. Chefs bring joy to people. They put all their heart into their meals I love being a chef"

You are a chef with a special love for steak and other carnivorous meals. While craving for steak parmigiana, you realize that you don't have any cheese left. Make a trip to the supermarket, buy some, and return to enjoy the feast.

Remember -You can't buy more than 15 products, or it's game over!

Made independently in 3 days for a university task. My first approach to Bitsy.

Task promp: "Make a Bitsy game with the following elements: Cheese-15 Items
